title:
"Serenity"

I felt a strong sense of serenity a few nights ago, while I was shooting with my girlfriend...

object.content:
"Serenity"

I felt a strong sense of serenity a few nights ago, while I was shooting with my girlfriend at Lake Cuyamaca. There was no one camping there that night, and the whole location was very peaceful. The cool breeze hit my face as I pressed the shutter, with such a great view of the milky way, who could complain? 

This photograph is a vertical panorama of 6 images to create the wide perspective. The images were overlapping at least by 50%. A few minor adjustments were made including color correction, noise reduction, and contrast to give the Milky Way more pop. I also had to go in and touch up areas around the trees and the lake.

There are two minor things I should cover in the photograph's description. The first is the foreground lighting. The ambient lighting was created solely from a nearby lamp post. The second thing to cover is the reflection on the water. You might be asking yourself, "There are stars in the sky, why are they not reflected in the lake." It's a great question and it all has to do with the calmness of the water. On this night there was a great deal of wind and that caused the water to be a bit rough, thus removing the glass reflections. 

I hope you all enjoy viewing the image as much as I did shooting it. :)

500PX: http://500px.com/photo/42691828

To see more please visit:
www.shainblumphoto.com
www.milkywayphotos.com

EXIF: 20SEC F/2.8 ISO3200
Canon6D, Sigma 20MM

#astrophotography #moon #galaxy #astronomy #stars #nature #landscape #lake #cuyamaca #photography
